column1: The '''Seventh Level''' of [[Moria]] or [[Moria|Khazad-dûm]] was a level of chambers
column3: being six levels above the [[Great Gates]].<ref name="Bridge">{{FR|II5}}</ref> The term ''level'' or ''levels'' in the ancient [[Dwarves|Dwarven]] kingdom generally refer to the eastern area of Moria
column4: nearest the eastern gate which was most populated when Khazad-dûm was a mighty city of the Dwarves.

column1: The [[Chamber of Mazarbul]] was located on the Seventh Level of Moria.<ref name="Bridge"/>
